channel.title: Posts on Jamvie, of CTF practise
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jamvie, of CTF practise

item.title: Jamvie's first post
item.description: Hi, and welcome to my CTF blog. I’m just a software dev with a hobby for CTFs, and I thought a blog would be a good way to stash all my long-archived writeups for CTF challenges I participated in. I’m by no means an expert on the topic, but if someone stumbles upon here and gains a newfound interest in cybersecurity, that would be pretty cool. Over the next few weeks I will upload my old writeups for some CTFs that occurred this year and last, so stay tuned!
